mapper.insert: insert into `sys_article` (label, title, content, author, status, create_time) values (#{label.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update `sys_article` set label = #{label.id}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, author = #{author}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, l.id AS label, a.title, a.content, a.author, a.`status`, a.create_time, l.label_name FROM sys_article a JOIN sys_label l ON a.label = l.id where a.id = #{id}
